<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <record_update table="v_plugin"> <v_plugin action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>active</active> <available_version>1.0.0</available_version> <definition><![CDATA[<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?> <plugin id="com.glide.automated_testing_framework" name="Automated Test Framework" version="1.0.0" provider_name="ServiceNow" state="published" type="application" licensable="true" namespace="sn_atf" cache_flush="true"> <description>Testing framework and tools for creating automated tests.</description>
<requires> <import plugin="com.glide.rollback" /> <import plugin="com.glide.ui.angular" /> <import plugin="com.glide.element_mapping" /> <import plugin="com.glide.vars" /> </requires>
<extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="AutomatedTestingFramework" class="com.glide.automated_testing_framework.api.AutomatedTestingFramework"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ExecuteUserTest" class="com.glide.automated_testing_framework.api.ExecuteUserTest"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="UserTestProcessor" class="com.glide.automated_testing_framework.api.UserTestProcessor"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="UserTestSuiteExecutor" class="com.glide.automated_testing_framework.api.UserTestSuiteExecutor"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="TestClaimer" class="com.glide.automated_testing_framework.api.TestClaimer"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="StepResult" class="com.glide.automated_testing_framework.api.StepResult"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="TestSuiteProcessor" class="com.glide.automated_testing_framework.api.TestSuiteProcessor"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ATFTrackerUtil" class="com.glide.automated_testing_framework.api.ATFTrackerUtil"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ATFFormUtil" class="com.glide.automated_testing_framework.api.ATFFormUtil"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="Step" class="com.glide.automated_testing_framework.runner.step.script.Step"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="StepConfig" class="com.glide.automated_testing_framework.api.StepConfig"/> <extension point="com.glide.scriptable_object" name="ATFVariableElementMapper" class="com.glide.automated_testing_framework.api.ATFVariableElementMapper"/> </plugin>]]></definition> <description>Testing framework and tools for creating automated tests.</description> <has_demo_data>true</has_demo_data> <help/> <id>com.glide.automated_testing_framework</id> <licensable>true</licensable> <name>Automated Test Framework</name> <path>plugin://com.glide.automated_testing_framework/</path> <provider>ServiceNow</provider> <requires>com.glide.rollback,com.glide.ui.angular,com.glide.element_mapping,com.glide.vars</requires> <scope>global</scope> <state>published</state> <supports_rollback>false</supports_rollback> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2017-12-05 06:05:21</sys_created_on>
